general_advisory: Go for planting vegetables immediately after rain for better utilization of rain water. Harvest the matured produce before the deterioration of quality. Staking should be given in case of banana plants to avoid lodging. Protect the mango in trees by netting from thunderstorm and heavy wind. Cover the freshly prepared vegetable nursery with polythene or with straw to avoid high temperature. Sesbania (Dhaincha) seeds @ 10 kg/acre should be sown as Green Manuring crop after summer ploughing. Apply mulches to maintain high moisture status in the soil.

advisory: Spray carbendazim 50WP@ 1.0g/l or Chlorothalonil 75WP@ 2.0g/l to manage anthracnose.
Use fruit fly trap to manage mango fruit fly.
Spray of copper oxychloride 50WP @2g/l + Streptomycin @0.3g/l to manage bacterial cankar.
Spraying borax @2.0g/l to manage physiological disorders.
Staking should be given in case of banana plants to avoid lodging.
Sesbania (Dhaincha) seeds @ 10 kg/acre should be sown as Green Manuring crop after summer ploughing.
Apply mulches to maintain high moisture status in the soil.
